ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

Class CustomActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.CustomActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorAnswerActivity, AuthorQuestionActivity, AuthorReplyActivity, CreateAccountActivity, HomeActivity, LoginActivity, MyAnswersActivity, MyFavouritesActivity, MyHistoryActivity, MyQuestionsActivity, QuestionPageActivity, ReadingListActivity, ReplyPageActivity, SearchActivity

    public class CustomActivity
extends Activity
    An activity used as a starting point for all activities within the application.
    Author:
    Benjamin Holmwood, Deborsi Hazarika

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        This function simply redirects to another activity when a certain menu item is selected by the user. It operates a switch statement to transition between different activities
        Parameters:
        item - is a menuItem signifying location within the menu that users wish to visit
